mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.name, p.breed_id AS breedId, b.name AS breed, p.age, p.gender, p.img_url AS imageUrl, p.species_id AS speciesId, sp.name AS species, p.status, p.shelter_id AS shelterId, s.sid, s.name as shelterName, s.location as shelterAddress FROM pets p LEFT JOIN species sp ON p.species_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN breed b ON p.breed_id = b.id LEFT JOIN shelters s ON p.shelter_id = s.sid WHERE p.status = 'AVAILABLE' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM adoptions a WHERE a.pid = p.pid AND a.status = 'PENDING' ) ORDER BY p.pid
